typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		body as (AccountID as string, Created as string, CreatedBy as string, LocationData as (AlternateWebsiteURL as string, AreasServed as string, Brands as string, BusinessCategories as (Category1 as string, Category2 as string, Category3 as string, Category4 as string, Category5 as string, Category6 as string, Category7 as string, Category8 as string, Category9 as string), BusinessDescription as (Description as string, LongDescription as string, ShortDescription as string), BusinessName as (Locale as short, LongName as string, Name as string), BusinessStatus as string, CredentialsCertifications as string, DisplayPoint as (Latitude as double, Longitude as double, Type as string, VerificationType as string), HoursOfOperationStructured as (Fr as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), Mo as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), Sa as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), Su as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), Th as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), Tu as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean), We as (Ranges as (EndTime as string, StartTime as string)[], State as boolean)), KeyFields as (AgencyCode as short, AutoDisplayPoint as string, CMR as short, CSOLocationID as integer, ChainName as string, CustomerServiceHours as string, Exteriorphoto as string, Flyerlink as string, GoogleBusinessDescription as string, HideAddress as boolean, ITGAccountId as integer, ITGAccountNumber as short, ITGClientId as short, ITGClientNumber as short, ManagerDescription as string, ManagerName as string, {Open Holidays} as boolean, PinMarker as boolean, Promotion1Image as string, {Reference Code} as integer, ScheduleApptURL as string, primarylanguage as string), KeywordsSpecialties as string, MediaURLs as (FacebookURL as string, InstagramURL as string, LinkedInURL as string, PinterestURL as string, TwitterURL as string), PaymentMethods as string, PhoneNumbers as (Fax as long, Landline as long, PrimaryPhoneNumber as long), PhotoURLs as (Description as string, Name as string, Type as string, URL as string)[], PrimaryAddress as (AddressLine1 as string, CountryCode as string, Locality as string, PostalCode as short, Region as string), Products as string, Services as string, Status as string, Tagline as string, WebsiteURL as string, YearFounded as date), LocationID as string, LocationNumber as long, Modified as string, ModifiedBy as string, ReferenceCode as integer),
		headers as [string,string]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	httpMethod: 'GET',
	timeout: 30,
	requestInterval: 0,
	paginationRules: ['supportRFC5988' -> 'true'],
	responseFormat: ['type' -> 'json', 'documentForm' -> 'singleDocument']) ~> sourceLocation
sourceLocation select(mapColumn(
		body,
		headers
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectData
selectData foldDown(unroll(body.LocationData.PhotoURLs, body.LocationData.PhotoURLs),
	mapColumn(
		Description = body.LocationData.PhotoURLs.Description,
		Name = body.LocationData.PhotoURLs.Name,
		Type = body.LocationData.PhotoURLs.Type,
		URL = body.LocationData.PhotoURLs.URL,
		LocationNumber = body.LocationNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenPhotoUrls
selectData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LocationNumber as string,
		Category1 as string,
		Category2 as string,
		Category3 as string,
		Category4 as string,
		Category5 as string,
		Category6 as string,
		Category7 as string,
		Category8 as string,
		Category9 as string,
		Category10 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		LocationNumber = body.LocationNumber,
		Category1 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category1,
		Category2 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category2,
		Category3 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category3,
		Category4 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category4,
		Category5 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category5,
		Category6 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category6,
		Category7 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category7,
		Category8 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category8,
		Category9 = body.LocationData.BusinessCategories.Category9
	)) ~> sinkBusinessCategories
selectData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LocationNumber as string,
		BusinessStatus as string,
		BusinessName as string,
		BusinessLongName as string,
		Locale as string,
		BusinessDescription as string,
		BusinessShortDescription as string,
		BusinessLongDescription as string,
		WebsiteURL as string,
		AlternateWebsiteURL as string,
		MediaURL as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		LocationNumber = body.LocationNumber,
		BusinessStatus = body.LocationData.BusinessStatus,
		BusinessName = body.LocationData.BusinessName.Name,
		BusinessLongName = body.LocationData.BusinessName.LongName,
		Locale = body.LocationData.BusinessName.Locale,
		BusinessDescription = body.LocationData.BusinessDescription.Description,
		BusinessShortDescription = body.LocationData.BusinessDescription.ShortDescription,
		BusinessLongDescription = body.LocationData.BusinessDescription.LongDescription,
		WebsiteURL = body.LocationData.WebsiteURL,
		AlternateWebsiteURL = body.LocationData.AlternateWebsiteURL
	)) ~> sinkBusinessDetails
flattenPhotoUrls sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LocationNumber as string,
		Category1 as string,
		Category2 as string,
		Category3 as string,
		Category4 as string,
		Category5 as string,
		Category6 as string,
		Category7 as string,
		Category8 as string,
		Category9 as string,
		Category10 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkLocationPhotUrls
selectData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		LocationNumber as string,
		KeywordsSpecialties as string,
		Products as string,
		Services as string,
		Brands as string,
		Tagline as string,
		AreasServed as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		LocationNumber = body.LocationNumber,
		KeywordsSpecialties = body.LocationData.KeywordsSpecialties,
		Products = body.LocationData.Products,
		Services = body.LocationData.Services,
		Brands = body.LocationData.Brands,
		Tagline = body.LocationData.Tagline,
		AreasServed = body.LocationData.AreasServed
	)) ~> sinkLocationServices
selectData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		AccountID as string,
		LocationID as string,
		LocationNumber as string,
		CreatedBy as string,
		ModifiedBy as string,
		Created as timestamp,
		Modified as timestamp,
		CSOLocationID as string,
		ITGAccountId as string,
		ITGAccountNumber as string,
		ITGClientId as string,
		ITGClientNumber as string,
		AgencyCode as string,
		ReferenceCode as string,
		CMR as string,
		OpenHolidays as string,
		ExteriorPhoto as string,
		CustomerServiceHours as string,
		HideAddress as string,
		PinMarker as string,
		ScheduleApptURL as string,
		ReferenceCode2 as string,
		ChainName as string,
		AutoDisplayPoint as string,
		PrimaryLanguage as string,
		GoogleBusinessDescription as string,
		Promotion2Image as string,
		Promotion1Image as string,
		FlyerLink as string,
		PrimaryAddressLine1 as string,
		PrimaryLocality as string,
		PrimaryRegion as string,
		PrimaryPostalCode as string,
		PrimaryCountryCode as string,
		DisplayPoint_Type as string,
		DisplayPoint_Latitude as string,
		DisplayPoint_Longitude as string,
		DisplayPoint_VerificationType as string,
		PrimaryPhoneNumber as string,
		Fax as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		AccountID = body.AccountID,
		LocationID = body.LocationID,
		LocationNumber = body.LocationNumber,
		CreatedBy = body.CreatedBy,
		ModifiedBy = body.ModifiedBy,
		Created = body.Created,
		Modified = body.Modified,
		CSOLocationID = body.LocationData.KeyFields.CSOLocationID,
		ITGAccountId = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ITGAccountId,
		ITGAccountNumber = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ITGAccountNumber,
		ITGClientId = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ITGClientId,
		ITGClientNumber = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ITGClientNumber,
		AgencyCode = body.LocationData.KeyFields.AgencyCode,
		ReferenceCode = body.ReferenceCode,
		CMR = body.LocationData.KeyFields.CMR,
		OpenHolidays = body.LocationData.KeyFields.{Open Holidays},
		ExteriorPhoto = body.LocationData.KeyFields.Exteriorphoto,
		CustomerServiceHours = body.LocationData.KeyFields.CustomerServiceHours,
		HideAddress = body.LocationData.KeyFields.HideAddress,
		PinMarker = body.LocationData.KeyFields.PinMarker,
		ScheduleApptURL = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ScheduleApptURL,
		ReferenceCode2 = body.LocationData.KeyFields.{Reference Code},
		ChainName = body.LocationData.KeyFields.ChainName,
		AutoDisplayPoint = body.LocationData.KeyFields.AutoDisplayPoint,
		PrimaryLanguage = body.LocationData.KeyFields.primarylanguage,
		GoogleBusinessDescription = body.LocationData.KeyFields.GoogleBusinessDescription,
		Promotion1Image = body.LocationData.KeyFields.Promotion1Image,
		FlyerLink = body.LocationData.KeyFields.Flyerlink,
		PrimaryAddressLine1 = body.LocationData.PrimaryAddress.AddressLine1,
		PrimaryLocality = body.LocationData.PrimaryAddress.Locality,
		PrimaryRegion = body.LocationData.PrimaryAddress.Region,
		PrimaryPostalCode = body.LocationData.PrimaryAddress.PostalCode,
		PrimaryCountryCode = body.LocationData.PrimaryAddress.CountryCode,
		DisplayPoint_Type = body.LocationData.DisplayPoint.Type,
		DisplayPoint_Latitude = body.LocationData.DisplayPoint.Latitude,
		DisplayPoint_Longitude = body.LocationData.DisplayPoint.Longitude,
		DisplayPoint_VerificationType = body.LocationData.DisplayPoint.VerificationType,
		PrimaryPhoneNumber = body.LocationData.PhoneNumbers.PrimaryPhoneNumber,
		Fax = body.LocationData.PhoneNumbers.Fax
	)) ~> sinkLocationDetails
